required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long-Term Follow-up Study of Participants With Cystinosis Who Received Lentiviral Gene Therapy AVR-RD-04
clinical_study.official_title: A Long-Term Follow-Up Study of Participants With Cystinosis Who Previously Received AVR-RD-04 (Also Known as CTNS-RD-04)

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multinational, long-term follow-up study to assess the long-term safety and durability of AVR-RD-04 treatment in participants who received a single dose administration of lentiviral gene therapy. No investigational product will be administered in this study. Participants will continue periodic safety and efficacy assessments in this long-term follow-up study up to 15 years from the initial date of AVR-RD-04 infusion.

detailed_description.textblock: Participants enrolled in a study where the individual received AVR-RD-04 will be offered participation in the AVRO-RD-04-LTF01 study. The Baseline visit for the AVRO-RD-04-LTF01 study will likely coincide with the final visit in the parent study. Participants confirmed eligible for the AVRO-RD-04-LTF01 study will be asked to return for study visits at approximately 6-month intervals for the first 4 years and annually thereafter for up to 11 years until a total of 15 years have elapsed during which time continued safety, engraftment, and efficacy of AVR-RD-04 treatment will be assessed.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of clinically significant AEs and SAEs
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with clinically relevant abnormalities, as assessed by vital sign (heart rate, pulse rate, and temperature)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with clinically relevant abnormalities, as assessed by clinical laboratory tests (chemistry and hematology)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with clinically relevant abnormalities, as assessed by by electrocardiograms (ECGs) (rate, rhythm, intervals)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Corneal cystine crystal score (CCCS) as assessed by in vivo confocal microscopy (IVCM)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Renal glomerular and tubular functions measured by glomerular filtration rate (GFR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in vision function as assessed by ophthalmology exams
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in grip strength measured by dynamometry
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in respiratory function measured by spirometry
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in bone density assessed by dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry (DEXA)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in muscle mass assessed by dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry (DEXA)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Endocrine function measured by fasting glucose, thyroid function, and gonadotropin levels
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in neurological function assessed by neurological exam (mental status, coordination, sensory, reflexes, and visual motor integration)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in psychometric function assessed by neurological exam (memory, oromotor function, intelligence quotient (IQ))
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pill/injection count related to cystinosis treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Cystinosin (CTNS) as assessed by quantitative Polymerase Chain Reaction (qPCR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in mean Vector Copy Number (VCN) as assessed by quantitative Polymerase Chain Reaction (qPCR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Cystine levels in leukocytes measured by mass spectrometry
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in ovarian reserve and menstrual cycle as assessed by anti-Müllerian hormone (AMH) and gynecology exams
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in male reproductive potential as assessed by urology exams (sperm count, motility, and morphology)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Absence of Replication Competent Lentivirus (RCL) as assessed by Elisa assay
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of anti-cystinosin antibodies as assessed by immunogenicity testing
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Health Survey questionnaire as assessed by (SF-36) scores
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Health Survey questionnaire as assessed by EuroQol EQ-5D-5L scores
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Treatment Burden as assessed by Burden of Treatment questionnaire (TBQ) scores
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Year 15 post gene therapy

arm_group.description: This is a long-term follow-up study of participants who previously received AVR-RD-04 (single dose administration). No investigational product will be administered in this study.

intervention.description: Safety evaluations, disease-specific assessments, and other assessments to monitor for long-term complications of gene therapy intervention.

biospec_descr.textblock: Blood, urine, bone marrow, and hair sample collections.

study_pop.textblock: Participants who received AVR-RD-04 and agree to comply with the study visit schedule and procedures.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
• Participant must have received AVR-RD-04 (also known as CTNS-RD-04) in a preceding study
Exclusion Criteria:
• Participant is currently enrolled in an AVRO-RD-04 treatment study. Participants who have either completed, withdrawn, or prematurely discontinued participation for any reason at any time after receiving AVR RD-04 are eligible for AVRO RD 04 LTF01 study participation.

patient_data.ipd_description: To keep consistent with current treatment listing
